issue.message: In Gradle projects, always use http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto for custom attributes
issue.summary: Finds resource namespaces with hardcoded package names
issue.explanation: In Gradle projects, the actual package used in the final APK can vary; for you can add a `.debug` package suffix in one version and not the other. Therefore, you should *not* hardcode the application package in the resource; instead, use the special namespace `http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto` which will cause the tools to figure out the right namespace for the resource regardless of the actual package used during the build.

issue.message: Duplicate id @+id/ll_bottom, already defined earlier in this layout
issue.summary: Checks for duplicate ids within a single layout
issue.explanation: Within a layout, id's should be unique since otherwise `findViewById()` can return an unexpected view.

issue.message: Duplicate id @+id/tweet_pub_message, already defined earlier in this layout
issue.summary: Checks for duplicate ids within a single layout
issue.explanation: Within a layout, id's should be unique since otherwise `findViewById()` can return an unexpected view.

issue.message: This class should provide a default constructor (a public constructor with no arguments) (com.tencent.sgz.common.QQWeiboHelper2)
issue.summary: Ensures that classes registered in the manifest file are instantiatable
issue.explanation: Activities, services, broadcast receivers etc. registered in the manifest file must be "instantiatable" by the system, which means that the class must be public, it must have an empty public constructor, and if it's an inner class, it must be a static inner class.
